remarks: Zero coefficient of a polynomial term.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)
statement:
coe1tm.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
coe1tm.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
coe1tm.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1tm.x $e |- X = ( var1 ` R ) $.
coe1tm.m $e |- .x. = ( .s ` P ) $.
coe1tm.n $e |- N = ( mulGrp ` P ) $.
coe1tm.e $e |- .^ = ( .g ` N ) $.
coe1tmfv2.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
coe1tmfv2.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. K ) $.
coe1tmfv2.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. NN0 ) $.
coe1tmfv2.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. NN0 ) $.
coe1tmfv2.q $e |- ( ph -> D =/= F ) $.
coe1tmfv2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( coe1 ` ( C .x. ( D .^ X ) ) ) ` F ) = .0. ) $.
